p: With global warming, upon changes in temperature, precipitation, and CO 2 concentration, and the changes in certain climatic resources changed the dynamics and balance of different species, thereby affecting their productivity ( Rivaes et al., 2014). When the distributions of climate resources adapting to N. jatamansi and N. chinensis change, the geographical distributions also undergo corresponding changes. The temperature increases strongly under RCP8.5 and may exceed the suitable temperature for plant growth ( Lv & Zhou, 2018). Thus, the climate-suitable area decreased in the 2070s under the RCP8.5 climate scenario compared to the current period.
